'''Tang Wuchou''' is a Treasure Hoarder from [[Liyue]]. He is located in [[Cinnabar Cliff]], [[The Chasm]].

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Tang Wuchou was sold a jade pendant and it leads him to believe he's a descendant of the [[Guhua Clan]]. However, this pendant is [[Smaragdus Jadeite]], which is known to make non-Vision wielders ill. This explains the headaches Tang Wuchou claimed to be experiencing.

==Trivia==
*After exchanging the egg for the pendant, his name will change to ''Claims to be "Tang Wuchou"'' and his title will be ''The Smaragdus Brave?''.
*After completing ''[[The Missing Miner]]'' World Quest, the player can find [[Uncle He]] at [[Cinnabar Cliff]] where he would make a final dialogue with Tang Wuchou before leaving.
